user.title: Set up TOU Schedule
user.description: After adding the integration, use Options to add rate types and rules. Start by adding one or more rate types (with prices), then create rules and time periods that map to those rate types. You can also set the default rate type in Options.

init.title: TOU Schedule options
init.description: Configure rate types (prices) and rules (when each price applies). Start with rate types, then build rules and periods.

rate_types.title: Manage rate types
rate_types.description: Rate types define the price values you reference in rules. Add at least one rate type before creating rules.

rate_type_add.title: Add rate type
rate_type_add.description: Create a price tier. The ID is used by rules; keep it short and stable.

rate_type_edit.title: Edit rate type
rate_type_edit.description: Pick a rate type to update.

rate_type_edit_detail.title: Update rate type
rate_type_edit_detail.description: Adjust the name, price, or default selection.

rate_type_delete.title: Delete rate type
rate_type_delete.description: Remove a rate type that is not referenced by any rule.

rules.title: Manage rules
rules.description: Rules define which rate type applies by month, weekday, and time periods.

rule_add.title: Add rule
rule_add.description: Choose the rate type and optional month/weekday filters. Then add one or more time periods.

rule_edit_detail.title: Update rule
rule_edit_detail.description: Change the rate type and optional month/weekday filters for this rule.

rule_delete.title: Delete rule
rule_delete.description: Remove a rule and its time periods.

rule_periods_menu.title: Rule periods
rule_periods_menu.description: Add, edit, or delete the time periods for this rule. Periods use 24-hour time.

period_add.title: Add period
period_add.description: Define a start and end time for when this rule applies.

period_edit_detail.title: Update period
period_edit_detail.description: Adjust the start and end time for this period.
